channel.title: Compiling Error
channel.description:
Try to compile client (did not make any changes after download)
[code]Applet_Sub1.java:11: error while writing Applet_Sub1: Applet_Sub1.class (Access is denied) public class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet ^ 1 error.[/code]
Tried running it as administrator: [code]javac: file not found: *.java[/code]
How can I allow access for my files to be written?
EDIT: this is a 317 client if that helps.

item.title: Compiling Error
